name: nacre
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a smooth, hard substance forming a layer inside the shells of some sea creatures. It is white but also seems to shine with different colours, and is used to make buttons and for decoration. Synonym
mother-of-pearl
Daniel Sambraus/Photographer's Choice RF/GettyImages
